name: Frontend Application
description: Contains the main React application components, entry points, and client-side development configurations.
assumptions: Assumes vite.config.js and eslint.config.js are primarily used for the client-side React application development and build process.

name: Backend API
description: Handles server-side logic and defines the API endpoints for data retrieval and manipulation.
assumptions: Assumes server/api.js is the sole backend component responsible for serving data or handling server-side requests.

name: Project Configuration
description: Manages overall project dependencies, scripts, and general repository settings including ignore rules and documentation.
assumptions: Assumes package.json and package-lock.json manage dependencies and scripts relevant to the entire project, rather than being specific to only the frontend or backend.
